fields.description: As a cloud user, I want a view of a single instance that will size well to different devices and show me information in a clear, easy to understand modeless view.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body: I can't find it elsewhere, but the attach volume dialog needs to recommend a device name. Here's the code the 3.4 console used: https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus-console/blob/maint/3.4/master/static/js/views/dialogs/attach_volume_dialog.js#L21

* add'l actions too far down the page
* needs better visual separation of sections
* some actions implemented here belong on landing page
* volumes are on separate tab but not image properties
* no/minimal help displayed
* some properties missing, check wireframe at https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Single+instance+view+-+refreshed
* KID/RID should be changeable
* detach volume selector is not consistent with gear model on other tiles

View console output should be available here. See wireframe at https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Single+instance+view+-+refreshed

for details of this and help display
I've been wondering about the volumes tab. That displays volumes in a grid view. On landing pages, users get to choose between grid and table. Could that be an option here?
I can't imagine anyone would attach enough volumes to warrant that.

little gear menu by the status should be just a dropdown of the status itself to stop, start, reboot, terminate. No separate gear menu. See wireframe at https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Single+instance+view+-+refreshed

Still need to add user data file support (will follow lead of other parts of code which aren't there yet).
Also need to implement modify instance ops when stopped instance props are adjusted.

* BFEBS instance missing text at top of page about stopping instance to adjust attributes. See wireframe at https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/3UD/Single+instance+view+-+refreshed (done)
* "Instance" tab text should be "General" (done)
* instance type widget is not wide enough to display all text it contains (done)
* instance type label should not have required field indicator (done)
* option under public IP address should not be "none assigned" it should be "unassign address" (done)
* RAM disk ID label does not match wireframe (done)
* missing confirmation dialog on changes of stopped instance per wireframe (done)

still TBD
* still using back arrow instead of breadcrumb model
* still missing user data upload (I know you know that, just including it for completeness)

opened up new PR
https://github.com/eucalyptus/koala/pull/84

Try this out with the instance update feature now. I've updated the list above.

Getting there, yay! A few comments:

* VM type and IP dropdowns are still not wide enough to show all text they contain 
* not seeing "unassign address" option under IPs?
* for the confirmation when changes are made to a stopped instance, the "no" option should not look like a button, but should look like the "cancel" option does on the single instance page. Ping me if you don't know what I mean here.
first two review comments from last time have not been addressed, did not check further. Please mark done when done so I know you did these, then move back into in review and i'll check again.
